snippet.title: Bobo's Funzone - OUT NOW (Mascot Horror Game)
snippet.description:
GET IT NOW ON STEAM ►► Tinyurl.com/zrrtvetv

Step into the haunting realm of Bobo's Funzone, in this horror/puzzle adventure. Your mission: find your daughter, who was attending a birthday party here. Navigate the eerie corridors, unearth what happend, and be careful and cautious as Bobo is about.

Release Date: 13 / DECEMBER / 2024

• Website: MascotBro.com
• YouTube: @mascotbro  
• Twitter: Twitter.com/MascotBroStudio
• IndieDB: Indiedb.com/games/bobo-s-funzone-mascot-horror-game
• Discord: Discord.com/invite/MsaaK93hWw

Game created by Uisco Games and published by Mascot Bro Studio
